name: Studio237
description:
Welcome to Studio 237!

You have been tasked with filming the lunar landing in case we don't make the real one. This is a matter of us and them. The space race has to be won!

You'll be placed on set where you will position lights, place the camera, and hit record to create your 15 second film. Pause and reposition as often as you need to tell your story, but be wary of the 2.5 minute time limit.

Find the lever and crank it to lower the lunar lander. Once it's placed on set, the astronaut will plant his flag and claim the moon!

HOW TO PLAY

•  Place the camera and lights around the set to create your scene

•  Record and pause to create clips until your film is full

•  Crank the lever to lower the lunar lander onto the set (once it touches down, the astronaut will plant his flag)

•  Beware of falling lights and even some wandering aliens!

CREATORS

Programming: Trevor Stroud & Travis Sowle
3D Modeling & Animations: Trevor Stroud
Textures: Arielle McMahon
Music & Sound Effects: Scott Ballew
